publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1556 Mr Jim Wallace: Scottish Strategy for Victims—That the Parliament endorses the principles of the Scottish Strategy for Victims; commends the development of the strategy which gives proper recognition for victims of crime and their needs; welcomes its emphasis on partnership working between criminal justice agencies to achieve the Executive’s objectives of better support and information for victims; and welcomes the commitment to action and real improvements set out in the Justice Department’s Action Plan. Supported by: Iain Gray*
